thread.title: Getaway in NYC
thread.title_full: Getaway in NYC - Review of citizenM New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dave A
title: Getaway in NYC
text:
i can't fault this hotel, staff were all great and there wasnt one to single out, all seemed happy in their work and were very attentive from front of house to the service staff and those in the restaurant
the facilities through the hotel were great, rooftop bar was great, and breakfast in a nice setup. Rooms are small, as all are in NYC but so well designed and organised i never felt claustrophobic as i have in other places. Windows to see NYC are great and iPad to control the room and tv is a great touch.
The beds were so comfortable - i think i had the best sleep in any hotel
Can't wait to go back again.
Room Tip: South side have great views See more room tips
